divs: sighting detailswe were driving on a road going out of wendell, nc heading toward raleigh nc. saw a bright light moving slowly in the sky from the north. had no idea what it was. it was very bright light in sky, appeared round in shape moving slowly toward the south. it stopped in front and above us (no idea of the altitude). i stopped the car in the road and just sat there and looked at it. maybe 5 min. maybe more. not over 10 min. i am sure. the object then took off at a rate of speed toward the south\south at a rate of speed i had never seen before nor since. my friend and i were amazed more at the speed it left with than the object itself. we sat there only a few seconds after it left and continued driving west toward raleigh. i just remember how amazed i was at what i had just witnessed and my friend and i talked about it for most of the night. i have never witnessed anything like this since. although this was about 27 or 28 yrs. ago i will never forget it. i would not believe in ufo's at all if i had not witnessed this myself
